design_philosophy.inspiration: SEO Group Buy Tools, Hacker Dashboards, SaaS Dark Mode
core_values: Clarity: High contrast for data and limits

tech_stack_strategy.css_framework: Tailwind CSS (MANDATORY - Install via CDN or NPM to replace/overlay Bootstrap)
tech_stack_strategy.js_framework: Alpine.js (Recommended for new interactions) or jQuery (Legacy support)

headings.usage: Page titles, Card headers, Big numbers

monospace.usage: API Keys, License Codes, Transaction IDs

layout_structure.topbar: Sticky top, minimal, balance display prominent

service_card.description: Compact card with logo, status dot, and 'Access' button
service_card.style: bg-slate-800 hover:bg-slate-750 border border-slate-700 hover:border-indigo-500 transition-all duration-300 group relative overflow-hidden

stats_widget.style: bg-gradient-to-br from-slate-800 to-slate-900 border border-slate-700 rounded-xl p-6

download_input.description: Main action area for pasting URLs
download_input.style: Large input field, monospace font, neon focus ring

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-lg for modals and sticky headers
visual_enhancers.gradients: Subtle radial gradients in background to break flatness
visual_enhancers.glows: Box-shadow with colored spread on hover (e.g., shadow-indigo-500/20)

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL TAILWIND CSS: Since the project is Laravel Mix + Bootstrap, you MUST add Tailwind. Use the CDN method for the quickest UI overhaul without breaking the build pipeline, OR install via npm if you are comfortable configuring Mix.
2. OVERRIDE BOOTSTRAP: Use Tailwind utility classes to override Bootstrap styles. Add '!important' if necessary or disable Bootstrap CSS for specific pages.
3. DARK MODE DEFAULT: Force dark mode styles. Set 'bg-slate-950' on the body tag.
4. USE BLADE COMPONENTS: Create reusable Blade components for 'ServiceCard', 'StatBox', 'Badge' to maintain consistency.
5. PRESERVE LOGIC: Do not touch the PHP logic in the Blade files. Only change the HTML structure and CSS classes.
6. ICONS: Use FontAwesome classes (fa fa-download) or SVG icons.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all buttons and inputs.

universal_guidelines.spacing: Use generous padding (p-6, p-8) inside cards.
universal_guidelines.radius: Use rounded-xl (12px) for cards, rounded-lg (8px) for buttons.
universal_guidelines.interaction: All interactive elements must have a hover state (brightness-110 or translate-y-1).
